discourse_list.title: Im having major issues Migrating SAI to DAI

content.content: I tried to migrate my crypto to the new network but for months now it isnt working and still pending, i tried cancelling but nothing, still have my eth which mean the gas fees wasnt applied, i’m stuck cause i want to transfer my SAI to Monolith Bank but i cant unless i migrate them and i have been having this issues for months now. please i need help im not on expert on it thank you   Image from iOS (1)1512×2016 851 KB
You may have more luck in the official chat: https://chat.makerdao.com/channel/help
